dt-example.title: Restore / show all
dt-example.info:
This demo of ColVis shows its ability to add "Restore" and "Show all" buttons to the list of column visibility options. This is done with the `restore` and `showAll` options which can be enabled individually if needed.
For full information about the ColVis options, please refer to the [ColVis options documentation](//datatables.net/extensions/colvis/options).
